content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the alytaus district court the court made a final resolution regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the court determined that the applicant will have sole ownership of the apartment and its basement as well as the debts owed to uab g and uab the applicant will also own the leased vehicle the defendant has acquired ownership of the vehicle and will compensate the applicant for the higher value of the property allocated to them the court also determined that the applicant will be solely responsible for paying off the joint debts taken for the familys needs the defendant has been ordered to compensate the applicant for these debts the court mentioned relevant articles of the civil code and discussed the dissolution of the marriage establishment of residence and contact arrangements for the minor children and the objection of a creditor the court allowed the action filed by t the court documents show that there was a marriage between the applicant and the defendant who have two minor children the courts judgment will divide the property acquired by the spouses the court clarifies the principle of division of property and the priority of the kind of division the court believes that this division of property is in the best interests of the parties the court also addressed the joint debts of the spouses and found the defendant liable for the obligations towards the creditors the court ordered the defendant to pay the applicants costs and the stamp duty to the state budget the court allowed the action in part dissolved the marriage and divided the matrimonial property

metadata.cost: 335.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 1'911,00 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
